id: Design Your Perfect Year Notion Template
name: Design Your Perfect Year Notion Template
description: Want to create your best year yet in 2022? I designed this notion template as a series of practices that you can work through as we lead into the new year that help you to slow down, be deliberate and consciously design the year that you've always wanted to live.There are 5 New Year Practices to work through to create your perfect year:Word Of The Year. Choose a word to define your year.Vision Board. Create a vision board to inspire and motivate you towards your goalsVisualise Your Day. Visualis
features: Word Of The Year. Choose a word to define your year.; Vision Board. Create a vision board to inspire and motivate you towards your goals; Visualise Your Day. Visualise what a day in your life will look like this year.; More/Less List. Write a list of everything that you want to do more of and less of in 2021.; Becoming Goal Setting. Set goals around who you want to become and practices that will help you get there.
